name: Land of Puzzles: Elven Princess
description: In Land of Puzzles: Elven Princess the king and queen need your help. To avoid war the king has accepted a challenge of puzzles to solve. He needs you to solve 15 sets of challenging puzzles and help him secure the kingdom.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Win 7 32-bit or higher 处理器: 2.0 ghz or higher 内存: 500 MB RAM 图形: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX 版本: 9.0 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
